description: The Isle of Man's bishop reflects on 2020 and coronavirus, and gives his thoughts on the future.
title: Covid-19: Pandemic 'exposed fragility of the Isle of Man community'
title_page: Covid-19: Pandemic 'exposed fragility of the Isle of Man community' - BBC News
maintext: He continued: "We have to be honest and say we have come out of it as best as we possibly could, and for that we're grateful I think."
